episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Resilient Rural Futures
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Resilient Rural Futures.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [ScienceAlert] Black Hole May Be '100 Trillion Times' More Powerful Than The Death Star and [XDA Developers] LocalSend replaced AirDrop for me, and it works across every device I own, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into resilient rural futures, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech optimist with an engineering background) and Casey (Community-first skeptic of tech promises).
